PropertySetDef.Name: COBie_Asset
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: An asset is a uniquely identifiable element which has a financial value and against which maintenance actions are recorded.
PropertySetDef.Applicability: IfcTypeObject Entity for COBie Type Worksheet

PropertyDef.Name: AssetType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies whether or not this is a fixed or movable item.
